original_text: Over the king's treasuries was Azmaveth the son of Adiel; and over the treasuries in the country, in the cities, in the villages, and in the towers, was Jonathan the son of Uzziah;
korean_text: 아디엘의 아들 아스마?은 왕의 곳간을 맡았고 웃시야의 아들 요나단은 밭과 성읍과 마을과 망대의 곳간을 맡았고

sentences.original_text: Over the king's treasuries was Azmaveth the son of Adiel;
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 국고를 맡은 이는 아디엘의 아들 아스마웻이요

sentences.original_text: and over the treasuries in the country, in the cities, in the villages, and in the towers,
sentences.korean_translation: 또 시골과 성읍과 촌락과 망대의 국고를 맡은 이는

sentences.original_text: was Jonathan the son of Uzziah;
